title: The Final Episode of 2021
description:
Lauren and Jeremy wrap up the year with one final episode. They review their upcoming plans for an unconventional Christmas at the soon to be crypto . com arena and New Year’s Eve in Canada. Jeremy inches closer to turning 30 and recaps his accidental $280 Christmas gift to a stranger.
